name: Plasma (DEMO)
description:
Plasma (temporary title) is a sci-fi FPS where you explore the unknown facilities, take down enemies, solve puzzles, unlock rooms, levels, and much more!  (not really)

Controls:

  • Keyboard & Mouse
  1.  WASD to move
  2.  Space bar to jump
  3.  Use mouse to aim
  4.  Left click to shoot
  5.  Right click for secondary attack (only for katana)
  6.  Scroll wheel / 1 & 2  to switch between guns
  7.  Q to switch weapon type
  8.  Stick to walls while moving forward to wall run
  9.  R to reload
  10.  F to grapple/dash
  11.  Esc to pause

NOTES:

  • The game is still in very early development/for demo.
  • May experience some bugs.

Available for now:

- Demo level

- Practice mode

To be added:

- More levels & game modes

- More features, weapons, enemies & bosses

*Any feedbacks and suggestions would be very much appreciated!*
